mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, READ_COUNT,CREATE_DATE
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${query}%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_DEL_FL = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
mapper.select:
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_ID, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - CREATE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END CREATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') COMMENT_COUNT FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%'
AND (BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${query}%' OR BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${query}%')
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${query}%'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS')CREATE_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS')UPDATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL='N'
SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_TYPE, ROADNAME_ADDRESS, STORE_TEL, CHECK_FL FROM STORE ORDER BY STORE_NO DESC
SELECT MEMBER_NO, AUTHORITY, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TEL, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM "MEMBER"
SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_TYPE, ROADNAME_ADDRESS, STORE_TEL, CHECK_FL FROM STORE WHERE STORE_TYPE = #{storeType} AND CHECK_FL = 'B'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BOARD_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberNo}, #{boardCode} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_CODE FROM BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_STORE_NO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO STORE VALUES(#{storeNo}, #{storeType}, #{storeName}, #{roadnameAddress}, #{landnumberAddress}, #{storeTel}, 'N', #{memberNo}, #{storeInfo})

INSERT INTO STORE_IMG SELECT SEQ_STORE_IMG_NO.NEXTVAL STORE_IMG_NO, A.* FROM
SELECT #{img.storeImagePath} S_IMG_PATH, #{img.storeImageOriginal} S_IMG_ORIGINAL, #{img.storeImageRename} S_IMG_RENAME, #{img.storeImageOrder} S_IMG_ORDER, #{img.storeNo} STORE_NO FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT S_IMG_PATH || S_IMG_RENAME AS ALL_PATH, S_IMG_ORDER, LICENSE_PATH FROM STORE_IMG JOIN LICENSE USING(STORE_NO) WHERE STORE_NO = #{storeNo} ORDER BY S_IMG_ORDER
SELECT LICENSE_PATH FROM STORE JOIN LICENSE USING(STORE_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE STORE_TYPE= #{storeType}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE
WHERE STORE_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
WHERE ROADNAME_ADDRESS LIKE '%${keyword}%'
WHERE STORE_TEL LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_TYPE, ROADNAME_ADDRESS, STORE_TEL, CHECK_FL FROM STORE
WHERE STORE_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
WHERE ROADNAME_ADDRESS LIKE '%${keyword}%'
WHERE STORE_TEL LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE STORE_TYPE=#{storeType}
AND STORE_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND ROADNAME_ADDRESS LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND STORE_TEL LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_TYPE, ROADNAME_ADDRESS, STORE_TEL, CHECK_FL FROM STORE WHERE STORE_TYPE=#{storeType}
AND STORE_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND ROADNAME_ADDRESS LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND STORE_TEL LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "MEMBER"
WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${searchquery}%'
WHERE MEMBER_TEL LIKE '%${searchquery}%'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, AUTHORITY, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_TEL, ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_DEL_FL FROM "MEMBER"
WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${searchquery}%'
WHERE MEMBER_TEL LIKE '%${searchquery}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, BOARD_CODE FROM BOARD JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND BOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%${keyword}%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE CHECK_FL = 'N'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STORE WHERE CHECK_FL = 'N'
AND STORE_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND ROADNAME_ADDRESS LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND STORE_TEL LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT STORE_NO, STORE_NAME, STORE_TYPE, ROADNAME_ADDRESS, STORE_TEL, CHECK_FL FROM STORE WHERE CHECK_FL = 'N'
AND STORE_NAME LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND ROADNAME_ADDRESS LIKE '%${keyword}%'
AND STORE_TEL LIKE '%${keyword}%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"')CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(C_CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" MI"분"') C_CREATE_DATE, BOARD_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, PARENT_NO, COMMENT_DEL_FL FROM "COMMENT" JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND COMMENT_DEL_FL = 'N') C START WITH PARENT_NO IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR COMMENT_NO = PARENT_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY COMMENT_NO DESC
